title: A Vel'Koz Poem
body:
Edit: Oh my Demacia! So many up votes and comments! Thanks for all the support, maybe one day I'll do another (cough cough Shen)

Warrior is red
Runeglaive was blue
You fucked up Darius
Dont fuck Vel too


1 Upvote = 1 prayer for all reworks that ruined champions

replies.body:
This poem is lame
My shit doesn't rhyme
Velkoz makes League's
Greatest hentai
sounded like a rhyme to me you liar
They're slant rhymes. :^)

Correct use of "they're".

Kreygasm
Vel'Koz isn't going to be touched, so don't worry about it too much.
He is going to be...
I'm at least 183% he won't be touched. He's in a good spot, relatively new, and has a good core theme.
Riot already said they will touch him

http://i.imgur.com/pRUQFWe.png

Looks like he's touching something, too ;)

> [{quoted}](name=Mcrarburger,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=LZlpZaqF,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-22T19:30:43.913+0000)
>
> http://i.imgur.com/pRUQFWe.png
> 
> Looks like he's touching something, too ;)

That header cut off 

Anal...  Lol
That was kind of the point...
This is why Riot's changing him. He's slowing the entries of champions tenfold because nobody wants to fight a gigantic tentacle monster engrossed in anal...ysing things.
Vel'Koz is going to do the touching.

haikus can be fun
but sometimes they don't make sense
disintegration
{{champion:161}}

Error 404
Your haiku could not be found
Try again later

I too want a turn,
Although I lack writing skills.
Hope it is not bad.

What's wrong with Darius?

And they already said that Vel'Koz isn't going to be changed much.
Think of what they did to Corki rather than what they did to Graves. Expect barely any changes at all.
Think what they did with Garen. Probably some new mechanic to make him not damage and damage and damage and damage and TRUE DAMAGE and damage....
I dunno, I think Darius is WAY more interesting than he was before the rework.

he's more interesting to some, far worse to others (me included, an ex-main)

but the fact remains that they completely reversed his playstyle and role in a teamcomp while calling that 'small scope changes'

What was his original playstyle? "Obliterate the enemy laner and splitpush the rest of the game because you are worthless in teamfights."

Frankly what we have now is better.

You, sir, are evil

Hate the champ update team, all the do is say screw you to the players that main a low pick champ and reworks it into the exact opposite of what it was wit op stats on release just to attract new players

"Play the new version or quit playing, we're never going to undo the rework because a few of the new players are enjoying it, go find someone else to main"

RIP {{champion:133}} (NOT MY BIRD, NOO ='/ ){{champion:72}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:122}}

I played a shit ton of Darius before he got reworked, as fun as it was to crush toplaners and be a prick early game, it wasn't worth being useless outside of lane. I'm fully willing to have a weak early game if it means I can be a legitimate threat in fights, and it created an interesting dynamic where the team actually tries to help Darius get that first dunk in order to unlock his power so he can singlehandedly win the teamfight for them, whereas before his ult was little more than a KS'ing tool.

Quinn is one of my favorite ADC's, I loved her old ultimate to death but it just didn't fit on an ADC, at least not in it's current state. I feel they could have done better and kept it somehow, but I enjoy her being viable botlane and her incredible map presence truly is unique.
He's more fun to mess around with now.
What did they screw up with Darius?

his entire playstyle and uniqueness before the rework was that he was the only immobile, squishy melee champion with no sustain (by squishy i mean no skills that allow him to mitigate damage dealt to him) and he worked best lategame as a powerful duelist and splitpusher. His itemization was mostly offensive with only the defensive items you absolutely needed as the game went on

Reworked Darius has sustain based off of his health pool, and tons of free AD in his passive, making defensive itemization far more efficient (and desirable). his gutted attack speed, removal of the attack speed slow damaged his potential as a duelist by a lot, while the Q cast time preventing him from using basic attacks during the windup and lowered W ratio made his tower pushing power far weaker (by also making triforce go from his core item to being really bad on him)

they took a champion with a kit that has horrible teamfighting and forced it to work by implementing a gimmicky ball of stats passive

Boy you have no clue what you are talking about. Old Darius was straight up garbage and he didnt work anywhere. They took an obsolete champion and made him functional, while providing counterplay to his laning

MY TURN

Roses are red
My name is Dave
This poem makes sense
Microwave

Vel'Koz is balanced
Illaoi is not
They'll try to do something
And they'll fuck up

Lemme try

Vel'koz is a mage
Who has been healthy for years
Why would you touch him?
It will surely bring tears

As you can tell
Many a rework can go sour
Cass, Morde, Darius
They make us sad for hours

But, look at the brightside!
Maybe Vel'koz will be done well!
Right now, we don't know
But time will surely tell.

Your poem is nice,
Your rhymes are fresh.
Ain't nobody got time for my shit.
Velkoz-Illaoi tentacle joke.
The end.

Brands are red
Xeraths are blue
Vel'Koz is purple
But that's the only difference

velkoz is purple
has three tentacles
he's now jungle!

Vel's in luck.
He isn't wearing a metal suit so he'll probably be fine.
also he doesnt have a bird by his side, so he wont get a free taxi ride

Your poem is bad.
Your comparison too.
When you freak about nothing
It makes me blue.

You want to talk poems?
Sure, lets go!
Lets give people reading
A wonderful show!

i'm not having fun
neither are you
Warrior is red
Runeglaive was blue

You wanna talk colors?
Why not talk about Lux!
The master of light
She knows her stuff.

What about pirates?
Their king was Gangplank
He ate his orange
And never got rekt by Blitzcrank

Your poems are bad
No rhymes to be had
What rhymes most with -plank
Are memes that are dank

A poetic duel
Is what you desire
I'll give you a good one
So bring it on dear sire!

Tentacle Vel'koz
He loves to disintegrate
ChampUp please don't touch

*A Vel'koz Haiku*

Darius rework was amazing other than the balance issues. It made his Q a lot more skill based while still retaining his identity. His passive is amazing fun especially at lower elos like mine when people don't realize that letting darius proc his passive means you die.

I wish they'd give Tristana her original eye color.  ~~That is all.~~

Edit:  and also get rid of her rat feet.
Ditto

All joking matter aside, 

surprisingly we have a small amount of actually reworks that completely destroyed champions. I wonder why people always act as if there were more fucked up ones then successful ones...then again it is in the eye of the beholder.....({{champion:161}} )
{{item:3070}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:82}} {{item:3070}}

People are especially apprehensive about a Vel'Koz rework because he's considered one of the most balanced and healthiest champions in the game alongside post-rework Sion. If they change him even by the slightest bit they could mess up his healthy gameplay.
